en.default_story: Our love story began with a simple glance, but grew into something more. We have come a long way together and are now ready to create our family.
en.hero_title: Create a digital invitation in 2 minutes
en.hero_desc: Forget paper invitations. Simply write to our WhatsApp bot and get a stylish page for your celebration.
en.feat_1_desc: Your invitation looks like a high-end website. No outdated templates.
en.feat_2_desc: No registration required. Just send your data to the bot and the link is ready.
en.feat_3_desc: Invitations look perfect on any device: from smartphones to tablets.
en.step_1_desc: Start a WhatsApp chat. The bot will ask all necessary questions: names, date, location, and itinerary.
en.chat_1: Hi! I'll help you create your wedding invitation. What's the groom's name?
en.step_2_desc: The bot will offer several design options: from classic "Silk" to modern "Starry Night".
en.step_3_desc: Get your personal short link and send it to guests. Beautiful display in any messenger.
